name: test-project-repository
description: A fullstack project with backend and frontend

scripts.install:all: bun install && cd backend && bun install && cd ../frontend && bun install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "cd backend && bun run dev" "cd frontend && bun run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "cd backend && bun run start" "cd frontend && bun run preview"
